name: Glacier Bay Mirrored Medicine Cabinet with Adjustable Shelves
description: The Glacier Bay 30 in. x 29 in. Surface-Mount Mirrored Medicine Cabinet beautifully combines the modern elegance of a beveled mirror with the timeless practicality of adjustable shelving. Featuring a tri-view design that offers multiple viewing angles, the cabinet's mirrored surface is frameless and easy to clean with a damp cloth, while the 2 adjustable shelves provide plenty of space for storing various sized items. Ideal for a wide variety of decor, this cabinet is fully assembled and easy to install with no hardware required.
